alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 10:25PM CDT until October 02 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1025 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles north of Keyes to 13 miles southeast of Felt, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Boise City, Keyes, Eva, Griggs, Felt, and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
